remarks: If the property ` A ` passes to open subspaces, then a space is n-locally ` A ` iff it is locally ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
statement:
restlly.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. A /\ x e. j ) ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. A ) $.
restnlly $p |- ( ph -> N-Locally A = Locally A ) $.
$d A j x $.
$d j ph x $.
